Html: Does anyone have a QuickGraph demo project with c# source? The old CodeProject source seems to be in .NET 1.0 and I can't get it to run in Visual Web Developer 2008 on Vista.

Working with directed acyclic graphs in C#. If there are any extensions for visualizations in html, that would be great. I started exploring the JavaScript InfoVis Toolkit, http://thejit.org/, but it doesn't quite do what I want with directed acycllic graphs. I understand QuickGraph is primarily algorithms for operations on graphs. The source to a working demo is a great way to get started.
You might want to take a look at Graph# or Graphviz (QuickGraph can render any graph to its format).

Thanks for the tip. I think I still might want to check-out QuickGraph. I was just hoping for a pre-built demo system with simple UI and existing test case data, rather than having to build all that from scratch. One example is often worth many lines of documentation.
